0.name: Hobbit Hash
0.description: Five flapjacks, potatoes, leeks, garlic, cheese.

1.name: The Full Flapjack Breakfast
1.description: Eight flapjacks, two sausages, 3 eggs, 4 slices of bacon, beans, and a coffee.

4.name: Shire Strawberry Special
4.description: 6 flapjacks and a hearty serving of strawberry jam.

5.name: Buckland Blackberry Breakfast
5.description: 6 flapjacks covered in fresh blackberries. Served with a large side of sausage.

6.name: Lembas
6.description: Three pieces of traditional Elvish Waybread

7.name: Muffins of the Marish
7.description: A variety of 8 different types of muffins, served with tea.

8.name: Hasty Hobbit Hash
8.description: Potatoes with onions and cheese. Served with coffee.

10.name: Roast Pork
10.description: An entire pig slow-roasted over a fire.

11.name: Fish and Chips
11.description: Fish - fried. Chips - nice and crispy.

14.name: Cookies and Cream
14.description: A dozen cookies served with a vat of cream.

16.name: Po-ta-to Platter
16.description: Boiled. Mashed. Stuck in a stew.

17.name: Bree and Apple
17.description: One wheel of brie with slices of apple.

18.name: Maggot's Mushroom Mashup
18.description: It sounds disgusting, but its pretty good

19.name: Fresh Baked Bread
19.description: A whole loaf of the finest bread the Shire has to offer.

21.name: Sausage Sandwich
21.description: Six whole sausages served on a loaf of bread. Covered in onions, mushrooms and gravy.

22.name: Shire Supper
22.description: End the day as you started it, with a dozen flapjacks, 5 eggs, 3 sausages, 7 pieces of bacon, and a pint of ale.
